HDG.LOG.content: correspond (entsprechen) sooner to Heraclitus’ thinking if… [why does it become clear?] > logos as Ratio, Verbum, cosmic law, the logical, necessity in thought, meaning & reason
HDG.LOG.linkedContent: correspond (entsprechen) sooner to Heraclitus’ thinking if… [why does it become clear?] > logos as Ratio, Verbum, cosmic law, the logical, necessity in thought, meaning & reason

HDG.IM.content: [method contra Nietzsche] unfolding that which was realized through Nietzsche by truly engaged attack on him > is Nietzsche final victim of fall out of Being? witness to a new necessity?
HDG.IM.linkedContent: [method contra Nietzsche] unfolding that which was realized through Nietzsche by truly engaged attack on him > is Nietzsche final victim of fall out of Being? witness to a new necessity?

HDG.BC.content: [phony inheritance] love of antiquity pretext to evade every decisive reflection > readiness to confront inception more vital than knowledge of any languages [but still must know Greek?] > readiness can originate as genuine (echte) only from necessities of history in which we’re placed: insistence on possession of truth makes remembrance of inception impossible

HDG.FS.content: no system strictly speaking in Kant, Kant speaks of unconditioned necessity, which humans require, as abyss, eternity itself in its terrible sublimity > God, for Kant, appears as abyss, “The Impossibility of Cosmological Proof of the Existence of God” = system’s impossibility

HDG.FS.content: most extreme danger [the worst?]: man feels only necessity of self-production (question of computer language) > physics can’t leap beyond itself, nor can politics (which lives today in dimension of science)

HDG.FS.linkedContent: most extreme danger [the worst?]: man feels only necessity of self-production (question of computer language) > physics can’t leap beyond itself, nor can politics (which lives today in dimension of science)

HDG.CCP.content: thinking as commemoration (Andenken), akin to what is noble (Edlen) > night entices you to exult > exulting in waiting, become more waitful & more void > emptier, but richer in contingencies [risk, chance] > noble is what has origins [cf. Nietzsche’s On the Genea…] > noble abides in origins of its nature [habituate to your heart?]
HDG.CCP.linkedContent: thinking as commemoration (Andenken), akin to what is noble (Edlen) > night entices you to exult > exulting in waiting, become more waitful & more void > emptier, but richer in contingencies [risk, chance] > noble is what has origins [cf. Nietzsche’s On the Genea…] > noble abides in origins of its nature [habituate to your heart?]

HDG.EC.content: not the unnecessary that’s cast into abandonment but we who don’t pay attention to it are abandoned > must learn necessity of unnecessary, & teach it to the people > learning waitful when it is a seeking (Suchen), teaching waitful when advising (Raten)
HDG.EC.linkedContent: not the unnecessary that’s cast into abandonment but we who don’t pay attention to it are abandoned > must learn necessity of unnecessary, & teach it to the people > learning waitful when it is a seeking (Suchen), teaching waitful when advising (Raten)

HDG.EC.content: [Chinese philosophy] “human needs only enough space to be able to put his foot down” > but what use would be that standing if a crevice opened up to the underworld around it? [shortest shadow] > no more use > from this, necessity of unnecessary clearly apparent

HDG.OHF.content: hermenutics: wakefulness (Wachsein) of Dasein for itself (not conventional understanding) > interpreting is a being, a distinctive how of character of being of facticity, that belongs to factical life itself (facticity not the object of hermeneutics) > chance that hermeneutics will go wrong belongs to its ownmost being
